projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects

fritz.title: Fritz - December 2024
fritz.description: My most precious project - the birth of my son Fritz. A new chapter in life, filled with love, joy, and endless possibilities.

cv.title: Education & Certificates
cv.description: My educational journey reflects my passion for technology and continuous learning. Starting with a strong foundation in mathematics and physics, I've expanded into computer science and modern web technologies. Through formal education and professional certifications, I've built a diverse skill set that combines theoretical knowledge with practical expertise in cloud computing and web development.

bta.title: Biological Technical Assistant
bta.description: Completed training as a Biological Technical Assistant, gaining strong analytical skills and a scientific foundation. This background has proven invaluable in approaching complex technical problems systematically.

bachelor.title: Bachelor of Science
bachelor.description: Bachelor of Science degree, developing a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving. Combined theoretical knowledge with practical applications in scientific computing.

master.title: Master of Science
master.description: Master of Science degree, further specializing in data analysis and computational methods. Enhanced expertise in statistical analysis and data-driven decision making.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Intensive training in modern frontend development technologies and best practices during a gap year. Focus on responsive design, modern JavaScript frameworks, and web development best practices.

fullstack.title: Software Developer
fullstack.description: Full-stack development of modern applications using .NET Core, Entity Framework, Python, and automated testing with Selenium/UIPath. Daily work with Git for version control and close collaboration in agile teams. Key projects include a modular enterprise management app (Blazor, ASP.NET Core, PostgreSQL) and a laboratory middleware system (Spring Boot, Java, Docker).

instructor.title: Programming Instructor
instructor.description: Programming instructor for Python (Basics, Data Science), Dart & Flutter, and HTML5/CSS3 (including SASS). Independently organized and conducted 4-week modules for groups of ~15 participants in full-time online courses.

aws.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
aws.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification, demonstrating fundamental knowledge of AWS Cloud architecture, services, and operations.

react.title: React Advanced
react.description: Advanced React certification covering complex state management, performance optimization, custom hooks, and modern React patterns.
